special_text:
[i](As the condition is met for the first time each turn, add a deed counter. Stop when the deed is done.)[/i]
Two or more card types have been put into graveyards from anywhere this turn.
Burning St. Musset deals 2 damage to each player.
At the beginning of your end step, Burning St. Musset deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.
